attributes.title: HE MADE ME KILL MY GRANDMA! AND MY FISH THAT WAS ON HER PERIOD!! SCARY POOPOO 🤮😭✨😱
attributes.review: So guys this app will literally destroy your mental health 🤩 like I just decided to download it and it took like 999 days to actually download it like really?! 😡Anywayyssss 😻😽 so it’s still downloading but like it downloaded but like yeah. So I went into the app and like got so scared because Donald trump appeared ON MY PHONE SCREEN! HE WAS DOING THE WHIP AND NAE NAE DANCE! HE THEN PROCEEDED TO POSSES MY PHONE AND MADE ME SIGN UP FOR THE APP! 😳😥🧎🏌️😭😱✨✨✨✨✨✨✨ so I literally like spiked my phone to mars and not even 20 seconds later my house suddenly was on FIRE AND MY GRANDMA WAS IN THE HOUSE! DONALD POSSESSED ME AND MADE ME LIGHT MY OWN HOUSE IN FIRE WHILE MY GRANDMA WAS INSIDE BAKING COOKIES FOR MY PET FISHES FIRST LADY PERIOD PARTY!,😱😱😱 AND I had like no where to live so I was on the streets for like 3 weeks and I was sleeping in a laundromat until freaking Donald trump appeared on the tv! It was so scary! I then got a call so from the laundromat phone so I answered it and It was Donald trump telling me that he was going to make me eat his and his supporters toenails AND drink the lady supporters period blood! 🤢😥 So I immediately ran out of the laundromat to find another place to stay. I eventually found an anime store and considering how much I 💞✨love anime✨💞I decided to stay there but that was until I saw DONALD TRUMP appear ON the TV ONCE AGAIN!!!! It’s like he was following me!! So creepy! 🤚😭 So I went somewhere else but like all the trump supporters were surrounding me and crowding me! They gave me jars of their toenail clippings and water bottles filled with rat poisons and period blood! 🤮I couldn’t handle it so I stole a rocket from NASA and moved to mars. That’s how I found my phone. All was fine until I decided to watch Boku no pico on my TV. I REGRET IT! Not only did I not get to enjoy my 🥰😍Boku no Pico😘🥰😍✨Donald TRUMP WAS ON MY TV! I SWEAR HES FOLLOWING ME! WORST THING WAS A TRUMP SUPPORTER CAME TO ABDUCT ME! Now I am sitting here, in a cold room where I’m forced to watch Donald trump. Help help! Everything in my life went wrong because of a simple app I downloaded to watch Boku no pico. 😔 Not even Sangwoo could help me. THIS IS A WARNING ⚠️ DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE JUST LIKE HOW IT RUINED MINE! ⚠️ DONT HAVE THE SAME FATE AS ME! LIVE YOUR LIFE! I am going to end this review here! DO NOt DOWNLOAD! WORST APP EVER! Also they made me eat Donald’s toenails and I swear I threw up every second until I blacked out! 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
Hah Gen z here and I’m here to say trump is stupid :>
